name: Tantric Adventurer
description:
Tantric Adventurer

Move with WASD or Arrows and Click to Attack

 Delay your foes' inevitable death to make your adventure last all night long!

Keep enemies in your combat aura to raise your Adventure Bar and double your score multiplier

Made for the  LD50 Compo

Credits:

Art, Programming, Game Design, Music, and Voiceover by Nick Scripp

Software tools used: Godot, GIMP, Pixelorama, Reaper, Linux

Font - 8 Bit Limit by Ænigma Fonts

Pixel Art Color Palette - DawnBringer 16 by DawnBringer

And a very special thanks to you for playing!
